description:
The various attributes of the snapshots created from volumes can be modified for making them accessible to public or to a particular user account.

The response parameters and supported attribute sets must be according the AWS specification:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/ApiReference-cmd-ModifySnapshotAttribute.html
title: Add support for EC2 API : ec2-modify-snapshot-attribute

comments.content:
The various attributes of the snapshots created from volumes can be modified for making them accessible to public or to a particular user account.

The response parameters and supported attribute sets must be according the AWS specification:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/ApiReference-cmd-ModifySnapshotAttribute.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mantihere

comments.content: Moving to Opinion as EC2 in tree API is deprecated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: cinder doesn't allow to modify permissions for snapshots/volumes. These objects can be seen only by owner or admin.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~apavlov-e
